compare.compare_1: Processing speed is not optimal when the number of trading pairs increases above 400 pairs.
compare.compare_2: The order transfer system is blocked when the number of users increases rapidly.
compare.compare_3: Not having Dark Mode - which save battery for user’s phone.
compare.compare_4: The Wallet system is not optimized.
compare.compare_m1: Increase order processing speed by 3 times with more than 500 trading pairs.
compare.compare_m2: Equipped a system that automatically expands the infrastructure when the user’s number increases.
compare.compare_m3: Released Dark Mode - improves the battery life by 30%.
compare.compare_m4: The user's security system is improved.
compare.compare_m5: Optimizing the experience to reduce operations by 50%.

theming.dark_mode: "The night sky in Maldives" is what to describe this interface, Dark Mode creates a professional and secured feelings for the user’s experience.
theming.light_mode: The Classic interface but changes with color improvements.
theming.mb_dark_mode: Inspired by "Maldives night sky", Dark Mode creates a professional and secured feelings for the user’s experience.
theming.mb_light_mode: The Classic interface but changes with color improvements.

attractive_features.title: More Attractive Features
attractive_features.description: The variety of products and features are optimized for users. Nami's ecosystem helps to allocate capital and update knowledge quickly from the market.

exchange_futures.exchange: From now on, The Limit - Market orders will be separated, making it easier for users to distinguish and avoid unnecessary errors.
exchange_futures.open_orders_description: The new interface integrates many features and switches the transaction button to the right side, maximize user’s convenience.
exchange_futures.token_info_description: Updating the outstanding information about tokens for users, thereby making reasonable investment decisions.
exchange_futures.futures_description: Nami Maldives gives “Futures Traders” a faster order processing speed than its predecessor, comes with more than 30 sets of indicators to assist users in identifying and trading Futures efficiently.
exchange_futures.futures: Understanding that convenience is essential when trading Futures, Nami Maldives has brought a “more minimalistic” and “easy-to-use” interface.

wallet.reason_2: Futures and Spot wallets are not integrated.
wallet.reason_3: Not display Staking and Farming wallet.
wallet.m_reason_1: Exchange, Futures, Staking, Farming Wallets are integrated.
wallet.m_reason_2: Easily Deposit / Withdraw and Transfer token between wallets
wallet.m_reason_3: Introducing Convert small balances into NAMI Token (coming soon).

method_kyc.title: Payment Method & KYC
method_kyc.payment_description: With Maldives Version, users can use their bank accounts as a direct payment method.
method_kyc.kyc_description: Protecting user' information and assets is Nami's guiding principle, accomplished through a rigorous verification process.
method_kyc.depwdl_description: Deposits / Withdrawals directly, quickly and conveniently with One touch.
